Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Forest Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
